Articles.Content: Does anyone know of any mod to see the location of moons (and planets) at some arbitrary point in the future? That would make planning gravity assists so much easier. As it is now you only see the position if your maneuver node happens to enter the SOI, so I wind up just fiddling with the maneuver nodes until it happens to enter the SOI, using the orbital periods of the moons to kind of guesstimate about where they'd be.

you could just open a sandbox and timewarp there...

AFAIK the way KSP is set up means, the dates are interchangable. 

correct me if i'm wrong

You could use the Transfer Planner mod to work out when the best time is to transfer to the SOI of the planet, then tweak it slightly to pass the moon. The transfer Planner also shows you the dV needed for just a fly-by without capture.
